      Getting started

      Yay, you have completed 5 out of 6 tasks already!

      One time update



      Fast

      up to 24 hours

      15 weekly keyword units

      Slow

      up to 7 days

      7 weekly keyword units


      Remaining weekly keyword units:

      Fast updates are limited to 5000 keyword units per day

       *The weekly keyword units spent for on-demand updates
      are only reimbursed at the beginning of the next billing month.
      Update speed explanation
      Trial accounts cannot run on-demand updates.
      You do not have enough keyword units left to start an on demand update.
